articles.title: Who is Jeanne Marrazzo? Inside Anthony Fauci’s replacement as NIAID director - Vox.com
articles.description: Jeanne Marrazzo’s appointment as NIAID director raises hopes the US will take steps to address America’s burgeoning STI crisis.
articles.content: The National Institutes of Health announced Wednesday that Jeanne Marrazzo, a leading researcher of sexually transmitted infections (STIs), will replace Anthony Fauci as head of the National Institut… [+9500 chars]

articles.title: Travis King: North Korea responds to U.N. over American soldier - NBC News
articles.description: North Korea has responded to United Nations officials about American soldier Travis King who dashed over the border into North Korea.
articles.content: WASHINGTON North Korea has offered a very brief response to United Nations officials about an American soldier who dashed over the heavily-guarded border with South Korea last month and was taken int… [+2250 chars]
